CARGURU is a car sharing service. The price for use includes absolutely all costs, including fuel, parking charge and insurance. All operations, including registration, opening and closing of the car are made via our mobile application.

What makes CARGURU different from a usual car rental
Firs of all, absolutely all costs associated with the use of the car are already included in the tariff. The customer pays only for the time when he used the car. there are no hidden costs, deposits and over-payments!
Secondly, all operations, including registration, opening and closing of the car are made via our mobile application. The user does not have to go to the company’s office to sign a contract, take the car keys and return them later at an agreed place. Our clients can take the vehicle exactly in the time when they actually need to and use it as long as they want to, and leave it wherever it is convenient for them.
And finally, our clients can rent a car for a short period of time — even for 5 minutes! After all, if a client needs a car only for a short period, then why would he overpay for the time when he is not using it?
Eventually, CARGURU is something more than just car rental. This is a fundamentally new perspective on mobility and an alternative to private transport.

Travel anywhere with your BVG transport ticket, whether you are a Berlin local or a visiting tourist. Always fast and as simple as possible!

So how does it work?

• Download the BVG Tickets app to your device 
• Connect your payment information 
• Select your ticket type
• Purchase the ticket 
• Download straight to your device and start your journey

BVG Tickets offers a ticket purchasing service only and does not contain any other kind of travel information. If you need further travel and transport connection information then please download our BVG Fahrinfo app. 

Avoid waiting for the ticket machine in busy train and metro stations by connecting the BVG Tickets app with any payment method like Amazon Pay, Apple Pay, SEPA direct debit, PayPal, prepaid, credit card or express purchase (registration and payment with Apple Pay, PayPal). 

In our app you can purchase tickets covering any of the following tariff zones: 

• Berlin AB
• Berlin BC (C area includes, for example, Potsdam and Berlin Airport BER)
• Berlin ABC (C area includes, for example, Potsdam and Berlin Airport BER)

All you need to do to get your next train, subway, tram or bus ticket straight to your phone is to register by using your email address, password, first and last name...that’s it. You’re good to go as soon as you purchase your ticket with the app. 

Already have a BVG account? Then you don’t need to register again and you can use your current account information to login and purchase tickets.

BVG Tickets is able to offer you any kind of ticket for travelling in Berlin, we have something for everybody whether you have lived here for 20 years or are visiting for 2 days! 

With the BVG Tickets app you can purchase any type of ticket for travel in Berlin, whether you are on your train journey to work or on the subway home from Berghain. 

Our ticket app offers: 

• Monthly pass
• 7-day card
• Monthly ticket trainee (AB)
• Berlin Ticket S (AB)
• 4-trip card
• 24-hour-ticket
• Single ticket
• Short haul
• Connection ticket
• Tourist tickets
• Bicycle ticket

We’ve got you covered for any type of ticket you need in Berlin whether you’re taking the train to Schöneberg, taking the subway in Kreuzberg, getting the bus in Neukölln or riding the tram in Prenzlauer Berg. Just purchase any one of these tickets to suit your needs and away you go!

BVG Tickets is the app that’s here to get you to where you need to be as soon as you’ve connected your card, PayPal, Apple Pay or any other payment methods listed above and you can beat the Berlin city traffic in no time.

We guarantee that buying your Berlin transport tickets through the app will save you time on any purchase. Don’t wait around in line at the service desk or ticket machine ever again. With the BVG Tickets app your transport links throughout Berlin just got a whole lot easier and faster! 

We welcome your feedback or suggestions, if we can do anything to help, you can contact us at appsupport@bvg.de and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

RIDE provides micro-mobility and e-mobility solutions. At the moment RIDE providing e-Bike sharing in Riga city.

1. Open RIDE app
Download the RIDE App from your phone's App Store. When it is downloaded, read the introduction with a short guide and register to be able to drive!

2. Find RIDE e-Bike on the map
Find the nearest e-Bike on the map displayed on our App. Make sure that the battery is charged sufficiently for your planned ride. Go after the e-Bike. You can reserve the ride for 3 minutes.

3. Scan or input the code
To start using RIDE e-Bike, stand next to the e-Bike and scan the QR code or input the code manually. E-Bike will wake-up and main display will switch “on”.

4. Start riding
Fold up the side support. Press “P” button on left hand combination switch to release parking mode and get in to “Ready” mode. Choose cycling mode “1” (15 km/h) – “2” (20 km/h) – “3” (25 km/h). To begin moving, turn right hand power handlebar. Use pedals if it’s necessary. You can use also cruise mode by pressing “C” on right hand combination switch to keep stable speed.

5. Where to ride
Ride the e-Bike on bicycle paths as regular bicycle and road part if bicycle paths is not available. You can use pedestrian sidewalks if road part has heavy traffic. Use bicycle paths as much as possible. Always respect the pedestrians and other road users.

6. Slowing down
To stop use rear brake press left hand lever and/or use front brake by pressing right hand lever.

7. Find where to park
Find green zone in the app map. Put the e-Bike on the sidewalk, at bike rack or any flat place where e-Bike will not disturb pedestrians and other road users.

8. Finish the ride
After e-Bike is parked in correct place. Finish the ride in the app and submit the picture. After ride is finish e-Bike display light will go “off” and beep will follow. How you can be sure that ride is finished properly.

Send an email to: support@ridemobility.eu or visit our website: https://ridemobility.eu
